title: Beastie Boys intergalactic
content:

comments.content:
I just stumbled upon this one:  
 [http://www.9031.com/downloads/fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141202021239/http:/www.9031.com/downloads/fonts.html "http://www.9031.com/downloads/fonts.html")

Check the [Compu-retro](http://web.archive.org/web/20141202021239/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/compuretro/?&sample_text=beasty%20boys%20..intergalactic..&update=0) FontList, you'll love it. ;)
